evidence.claim: WorkHack utilizes AWS for cloud services and scalability.
The platform ensures HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive health information.
Integration with EHR systems is supported using HL7 and FHIR standards.
WorkHack employs API-based integration patterns to streamline data connectivity.
Real-time data processing is managed through AWS Lambda and message queues.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found relevant to healthcare data exchange.
